summary: App with admin management: maintain an admin list and allow adding multiple Internet Identity principals as admins (e.g., for Thejas Umesh Poojary).
architectural_notes: Use an admin list that supports multiple Internet Identity principals; allow adding an admin by supplying a principal ID.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add admin management to support multiple Internet Identity principals and allow adding new admins by principal ID (e.g., add Thejas as admin).
Ensure the Internet Identity principal "ekphf-6psww-nfwx5-qaowa-goqyc-hgqqa-4m57p-3xfjb-kb73d-joktd-sqe" is granted the admin role (multi-admin) so they can access all admin-only routes and APIs.

Implement a safe, conditional upgrade path so existing deployed canister state gains the admin role for "ekphf-6psww-nfwx5-qaowa-goqyc-hgqqa-4m57p-3xfjb-kb73d-joktd-sqe" without losing existing data (products, updates, contacts, profiles, logo) and without breaking current admins.

projectName: Add Thejas principal (ekphf-6psww-...) as an admin
